meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a rubber sole worn for sports or casual occasions.
meanings.sent1: I wear my sneakers to play basketball with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of sneakers for her morning walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear sneakers to sneak up on the birds.
meanings.sent4: His sneakers were like silent protectors on his feet.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sneakers stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To move in a quiet, stealthy manner.
meanings.sent1: He likes to sneakers around the house when everyone is asleep.
meanings.sent2: The spy decided to sneakers past the guards undetected.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to sneakers through the fallen leaves without making a sound.
meanings.sent4: She had to sneakers out of the room before her surprise was ruined.
meanings.sent5: The ninja could sneakers through the shadows without a sound.
